noInternet: Error: an internet connection is required to set up the app

pleaseSelectLanguageTitle: You have to select a language before continuing.

body0: Waha is an audio-based Discovery Bible Study App.
body1: Gather a group of friends or family and pick a story from the Foundations or Topics Sets.
body2: Listen to the story and discuss the questions with your group.
body3: Each story brings insight for your group to discover the love and purpose of God.
loadingMessage: Hang on, we're setting things up...
errorMessage: Sorry, there was a problem during fetching. Please check your connection and try again.
